name: Etherael
description:
This game was made three years ago.  It's one of those big projects that never get completed...

Looking back at it now i see so many flaws that i can't believe i didn't see back then.. There is an overall floaty feeling , the distance and the camera angle makes the environment and the characters unreadable , the controls are overly complicated without reason and there is not much impact. 

But it also has some good elements and tons of details,like mounts, a basic chemistry system ( organic materials burn,etc) , fully interactive environment and a lot of attention to little details. 

It's not even close to a finished and polished game,but i hope it's not that terrible and even if one person takes enjoyment out of it,it's more than enough for me. Thank you.
